title: Calling all Quantum Enthusiasts! Join us for Graviton 2.0 - The Ultimate Quantum Hackathon
content:
Calling all tech enthusiasts!

Join us for the first hackathon of |Q>Forest: Graviton 2.0- a 24-hour Hackathon!

Get ready to quantum leap into the future!

**Date:Â April 6thÂ and 7th, 2024**

**Venue: 13th Floor, BE Block,, PES University, RR campus, Bangalore**

This isn't just any hackathon - it's a gravitational pull towards boundless innovation. Are you ready to:

* Quantum leap into a superposition of possibilities: Tackle real-world challenges with solutions that defy classical logic and harness the power of entanglement.
* Form fermionic friendships: Collaborate with fellow quantum pioneers and lay the groundwork for groundbreaking research.
* Elevate your career to new heights: Seize stellar prizes and propel yourself into the quantum spotlight, reaching scientific singularity.
* Connect with quantum luminaries: Network with industry leaders and navigate the quantum landscape toward the forefront of knowledge.
* Open innovation is paramount at our hackathon. Whether your ideas are quantum or non-quantum, every participating team is encouraged to explore their creativity and ingenuity freely.
* Win exciting cash prizes and goodies.
* Work onÂ **Honeywell Aerospace**Â Sponsored problem statements.

Our title sponsors are - Â **Honeywell**, Innovating energy-efficient products, chemicals, technologies, and services for your needs.

Save the date, fire up your quantum processors, and brace yourselves for a journey beyond imagination! We will unveil quantum updates as intricately entangled as the particles themselves, so stay tuned!

Registration link :Â   
[https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSde6WqXNx-LNA3biNnxDZnQEkGvLUoHOakjA45czVj7FKI3qA/viewform?usp=sf\_link](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSde6WqXNx-LNA3biNnxDZnQEkGvLUoHOakjA45czVj7FKI3qA/viewform?usp=sf_link)

**Deadline to register :Â 2nd April 2024, 04:00 PM**

For any queries contact:[qforest@pes.edu](mailto:qforest@pes.edu)

or reach out to us on our Instagram :@pes.qforest ( [https://www.instagram.com/pes.qforest?utm\_source=ig\_web\_button\_share\_sheet&igsh=ZDNlZDc0MzIxNw==](https://www.instagram.com/pes.qforest?utm_source=ig_web_button_share_sheet&igsh=ZDNlZDc0MzIxNw==) )
